title: Channel Islands National Park: Ocean
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Webcams     Ocean                Channel Islands Live Ocean Webcam       Experience one of the richest marine environments in the world with a virtual visit to the Ocean Webcam. This webcam captures your attention with views of the majestic amber-colored kelp forest and the nearly one thousand different marine species found there.              If there is a problem with the video on this page, please view the live stream at Explore.org. There is no technical support regarding the this stream. However, we do welcome your feedback: e-mail us      Partnership The Ocean Webcam is made possible through an educational partnership between the National Park Service, Explore.org, and Ventura County Office of Education.   Location of Ocean Webcam The Ocean Webcam is located within the landing cove on Anacapa Island.
